website_summaries.verdict: Able to generate great sound throughout the range. Better bass than many soundbars.
pros: Will work with many Bluetooth enabled devices for a mobile connection
Very easy to set up and begin using immediately
Includes a remote control for access to the soundbar's settings
Offers both crisp sounds at the high end of the range, as well as powerful bass sounds
cons: Quite a bit larger than most soundbars, which some people won't like

customer_reviews.title: OBF (out of box failure) processed warranty through Klipsch. ...
customer_reviews.text: OBF (out of box failure) processed warranty through Klipsch. Sound Bar would not turn on at all. Brick had power but sound bar wouldn’t power up at all. The big issue now being you pay the return shipping for their defective merchandise + yo have to ship ALL the product back even if (1) piece fails... and it’s costly to send even via UPS ground. Buyer beware, you shouldn’t suffer ANY financial impact when a brand new product is defective.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: My advice to anyone that has had experience with Klipsh. Do not buy anything made by this company. For the last 30 years I’ve been buying nothing but Klipsh. If I didn’t pay so much for the sound bar I would throw it in the trash. No complaints with sound quality. The Bluetooth for a high-end company is nothing but the worst. The remote is even worse. Please do not buy this product. It will save you a lot of grief in the long run. So long Klipsh. You suck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soundbar - crisp sound you'd expect from Klipsch. Blows my old Polk SB 5000 out of the water. Very nice upgrade and fits under my 75" Samsung LED TV nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: and this fit the bill nicely. The sub is wireless and is more than ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the bleeding edge of technology these days, but the quality of the audio is everything I wanted it to be. My primary goal was to NOT have satellite speakers and wires everywhere, and this fit the bill nicely. The sub is wireless and is more than powerful enough. The bass is clean and consistent, and the sound bar itself puts out clear and clean audio. If there's one downside, it's the height of the sound bar, which might require you to have your television on a stand of some sort for it to not cover the bottom of the screen, but that's a non issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: jbee

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Don't waste the money.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Don't waste your money. I've had this thing for about 13 months and have had to replace the power supply once, subwoofer now doesn't connect, and the sound crackles until you reboot the sound bar, a few times a day. I hate this piece of crap. It's a paperweight. Buy something better, Klipsch fail 100%. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: ----------VERY GOOD SOUND BAR , SUB WOOFER COMBINATION----------
customer_reviews.text: I TURNED UP THE SUB WOOFER TO (MAX) WITH THE KNOB ON THE BACK OF THE SUB WOOFER AND THE BASS SOUND COMING FROM PROGRAMS WITH BASS IN IT SOUNDED OFF REAL GOOD. THE HIGHS OR TREBLE IS VERY CLEAR WITH THE SOUND OF THE DEEP BASS SOUND. ONE DOESN'T TAKE AWAY FROM THE OTHER. THE SOUND FROM DIFFERENT MOVIES AND TV SHOWS ARE SET UP DIFFERENTLY , AND THIS SOUND BAR / SUB WOOFER COMBINATION MAKES THEM ALL SOUND GOOD , NO MATTER WHAT I'M WATCHING. I'M SATISFIED. SOME PLACES ARE SELLING THIS PRODUCT FOR DOUBLE THE PRICE I PAID ON AMAZON. I GOT A DEAL.
customer_reviews.author: RACER ONE

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but lacking in other areas
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this is great, perfect actually.. but my problem is there is no digital display so you cannot adjust the levels on the bass or treble which makes this a terrible soundbar if you're looking to personalize the way this sounds. I cannot tell the difference between the 3d sound on or off.. all in all this works well but I wouldn't pay 399 for this, I got this on sale so it made it worth it but there are other sound bars you could get for less than 399 that provide more options and better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Verth

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Extremely loud. Best soundbar for the price. Enjoy it better then my friends BOES soundbar and sub and is literally 1/4 the price. With that being said, the Bluetooth connection isn’t very good from far distance and the remote has to be pointed directly at the soundbar to really work. The 3D sound is pointless garbage. Great soundbar - friends are always impressed by the sound. Soundbars are not perfect! If you truely want the best spend the money a true surround sound set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually love it. Like, I've tried a bunch of different systems in the past year trying to find one I enjoy, and I really, really enjoy just turning this on. It took me maybe 20 minutes to set up as I didn't know it didn't come with the plug I needed, but it was worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Considering Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Remote does not work and is junk. Instructions to program tv remote are unclear, gave up. Front controls are a joke. Very little bass even with subwoofer on max. If Bluetooth on phone is on, it disconnects tv. Sound is below average. Purchased because Klipsch is supposedly good, but never again.
customer_reviews.author: jallen

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch has done it again
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly expensive Boston Acoustic 7.1 tower speakers with Sub woofer for my Marantz receiver. This Klipsch system sounds as good if not better that my main system. I am very satisfied with the sound. The sub is about 30 feet from the bar and still picks up the signal from the bar. I was worried about some of the negative reporting about blue tooth loosing signal but I have not had any issues with it. I would recommend this sound bar and sub as a very good buy. Klipsch has done it again.
customer_reviews.author: TooSassy1

customer_reviews.title: Warm sound with a sub with the bass punch I ...
customer_reviews.text: Warm sound with a sub with the bass punch I was looking for. Optical only, no HDMI passthrough...but for now this system rocks the house.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Broken volume buttons. 😢
customer_reviews.text: Sound was ok for a while. But the Up AND down volume buttons broke. When I paid over $500 I expected it to last a while. Had no clue Klipsch has gotten so cheap. Come on Klipsch you were known for quality.....where’s that at now?
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing. Clarity from the high range to the bass ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The sound quality is amazing. Clarity from the high range to the bass is great. The sub KICKS, it actually shakes the house and it's a 4 bedroom house! CONS: You can't have the source of sound more than 3 away though or it cuts out, that's a major flaw. You can't connect it to anything else other than your TV also. I wanted to get all my sound components (receiver, book shelf speakers, TV) connected, but you can't do that with this set. I almost sent it back, but the quality is so incredible I will just get some tower speakers for the receiver and other speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissia Olin

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there - Bluetooth & remote almost useless
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound fantastic and the setup was as easy as can be, but the short distance bluetooth range drives me crazy. I had heard from other reviewers it's about 30 ft. For me, it's more like 10 ft MAX. The same thing goes for the remote, making it pretty useless... I'm still conflicted as to whether or not I should return my set. Running the sound from my Apple TV allows me to get around the bluetooth and remote issue, but for the price I'm not completely satisfied. I believe there are better products out there, especially in 2017!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Duska

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound just wish it could be expanded with rear BT speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality and I'm impressed with the lack of or absence of sound sync to video. I can't tell that the sub is wireless and my only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that it doesn't have the ability to add rear BT speakers to upgrade later. If that were possible I couldn't imagine a more perfect soundbar sub solution at this price. I've been using mostly Denon, Yamaha, and Onkyo receivers in the past and this is easily equal in sound quality. Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: rm3sweet

customer_reviews.title: We love this soundbar and so far have had no problems ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, It's Klipsch. We love this soundbar and so far have had no problems with it. It has that awesome Klipsch sound and can play extremely loud if you desire.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Barton

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. It’s not a $1200 unit. But it does put out a full sound. Had issues with programming a remote with only the instructions included, but a YouTube video got the job done. Would be nice to have a better way to control sub. Seems to be lacking during music and really powerful during movies. Going to look more into finding these. At this time nothing has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not leave many reviews but I have to for this purchase. For this being a $750 item at this discount price this sound bar blows everything else I have listened to at this price out of the water. Yes the remote is cheesy but the bar and woofer are top quality and the theatrical experience is AMAZING!!! If you are a average joe like me with a base knowledge of speakers and all you want is kick rear sound quality then this is perfect! Sound is crisp and clean and the bass is booming. What more do you need to know?
customer_reviews.author: MTHunter

customer_reviews.title: Remote is useless
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar sounds great, but the remote is a total piece of garbage. Changed the battery thinking it was dead, but changing it didn’t make a difference. The lack of a working remote is pretty frustrating and may warrant the return of the entire unit. I am pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise love it. Louder an fuller sound than my Onyko ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a little bit of sound breakup using the fiber optic cable. Otherwise love it. Louder an fuller sound than my Onyko home theatre systen. This one was a gift for my sister's family and they love it as well. Haven't experimented too much with Bluetooth capabilites, but it rocks my mp3 collection on my phone. Would recommend. I understand Klipsch has discontinued this model. Love to know why.
customer_reviews.author: NDGator

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection is spotty
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the R-20B is as good as, if not better than expected. My only negative... and a big one for me, is that the bluetooth or near field is spotty. I like to stream music from my phone and the connection cuts in and out far more than a $600 set up should. I've got a $20 wireless bluetooth speaker that has twice the range. I've got it mounted to the wall and happy with everything else... so I'll stick with it. But a little frustrated with that one aspect.
customer_reviews.author: James Kooi

customer_reviews.title: sound is good but not great
customer_reviews.text: so the bluetooth is problematic. i have to manually turn off and back on the sound bar basically every time i power up the monitor... if i don't then there's no sound. sound is good but not great. dialogue plays low and sfx play hot. music playback isn't impressive.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: REMOTE is terrible.. But Youtube has a fix!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and sound is nice once it breaks in. REMOTE is WORTHLESS!! Only works directly in front and less than 3 feet away. Manual was incorrect on how to program other remotes. However YouTube has a great video that works perfectly!!! Now I am satisfied. Almost dumped the soundbar.....
customer_reviews.author: Dave Angell

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound - simplify your life
customer_reviews.text: Wow, incredible sound. Voices are very clear in every movie and the bass is impressive. Volume control works as expected - it's easy to get the right volume. I was also very happy to get rid of my old receiver and all those wires.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Guillaudeu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound! The most musically engaging sound I've ever had from a soundbar. its a pleasure listening to Pandora music as well as movies. I'd give it 5 stars if it had different settings for music-movies-sports-etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound - amazing footprint
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound - amazing footprint. Very compact. Considered many other options, including far more expensive Bowers and Wilkins, BOSE...sound quality on this is amazing Don't hesitate. Also sounds great with bluetooth music.
customer_reviews.author: MillbrookMansion

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Frustrating Auto Input Switching
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing... BUT- any bluetooth device can connect to this soundbar, and reconnect. So, if you have your phone or other device bluetooth connected to the speaker bar, switch to the optical or RCA input it will only stay there momentarily until your bluetooth device (or anyone elses) tries to connect to the bar. Really makes the thing useless unless you never use bluetooth or are not in a place where other people can connect to the soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kingland

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar for the home. For sound quality there is nothing better. My one issue is that the remote range is very limited, and you cannot connect these speaker to the Wireless App Play-Fi to connect with wireless home control sytems. If there is a way to connect this, Id be so appreciative of knowing.
customer_reviews.author: bearclaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I upgraded over the vizio bar with a small sub and there is no comparison. This system shakes my whole house and the clarity is great. No distortion even at full volume. You wont be dissatisfied with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this soundbar is great. I tried the polk audio and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: this soundbar is great. I tried the polk audio and it was garbage. I sent it back and ordered this one and the sound is amazing very clear and loud. the subwoofer is awesome and the bass is legit. I would definitely recommend this soundbar to anyone. I've always been skeptical about soundbars because im used to home theater systems but it was money well spent. awesome for music and movies im not a big gamer but how it does with everything else im sure it would be great. the only down fall is it doesn't turn off on its own when you shut everything down but it does turn on when you turn everything on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brunet

customer_reviews.title: New Samsung Smart TV sounds great now
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the reputation it has. Complete and full sound. Movies and TV come to life. New Samsung Smart TV sounds great now. Streaming music from the iPhone or iPad is a breeze and sounds like a $1,000. system. My only complaint Mr. Klip is that it forgets the bluetooth connection after a few minutes of inactivity. C'mon, we're smarter than that. Buy it. You will NOT be let down.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Cox

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This worked OK but failed to meet my expectations for sound quality. Certainly better than just using the TV but I decided I would prefer a higher performing product and chose to return this.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: More volume than I can use and feel like a decent human being with neighbors. Sub is a little lacking down low, and definitely sounds better behind the couch than in front of you. Audio quality is fantastic otherwise. PSA: The remote is garbage, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: Good product I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Could have a little more powerful sub, but overall I think it sounds very clean and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy..good sound, Bluetooth is weak...as with most all bluetooth devices. Remote is so small and cheap it will be broken or lost in a week
customer_reviews.author: Jerwin3

customer_reviews.title: Love the clean clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Have it setup in master Bedroom love the sound and clarity. The highs are spot on and the sub woofer adds that needed punch when you have a movie that has some great bass. Playing my music through it with the Bluetooth is easy and I enjoy my rock and roll at high volume with out and distortion again the sub woofer works great in all aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound system could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: The bar has a nice sound no distortion but not really crazy about the subwoofer I was expecting a little more sound quality then just a heavy Bass. Overall it's a good system but didn't really knock my socks off as far as sound quality goes . Very easy to install also makes a nice appearance the reduced price made it very easy to accept
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Unbelievably Good
customer_reviews.text: First purchase of this manufacturer. Was rewarded with such a superior product. And of course, AFTER I bought it, everyone was like, "Yeah, Klipsch is the best, duh"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this instead of the Big Box stores advertised bars for just a little more $
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound and easy installation for the price. This is a little more expensive than the other sound bars that are advertised more and stocked by big box stores by less than $100, but the sound quality doen't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Another great Klipsch sound bar
customer_reviews.text: The r-20b sounds great! We also have the r-10 and we think this has stronger bass from the subwoofer than the 20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good system for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great system! Easy set up. Can switch from TV to phone input quickly and effortlessly. We have it in a small living room and it sounds like a big screen theatre. Nice deep base, rich treble.
customer_reviews.author: Cara H.

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is regarding interface and bluetooth connectivity. As their is no real display, it is not always clear what the speakers are receiving signals from or if the remote's signal reached the unit. Acoustically, I am very happy with it, which is the most important thing to me. Bass is deep and clear. 3D mode as others have said sounds horrible, so simply don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound. Bad remote.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good for what it is, however, the remote does not work. When I first recieved the unit the remote worked on and off at a max distance of 2ft from the sound bar. Now it just doesn't work at all. This normally wouldn't be that much of a problem since it is bluetooth. But for all other functions I am required to get up and manually adjust the volume. This has proven very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch is quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound system for 315 dollars. Horns (speakers) can be sharp overall great balance sound!
customer_reviews.author: L-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Grate sound, horrible remot
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound bar, wonderful sub sounds amazing! Connects easily to tv. All agree with other reviews the instructions need Improvement. And so does the remote you have to just hold that thing just right to get it to work it's really annoying. I'll give it 4 stars just because the sound it's great
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SYSTEM !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a top-notch system. I actually considered buying it when it first came out. Very happy I waited. The price I paid, vs the quality, is outstanding !!! Movies and music are accurately reproduced. I have known that Klipsch was a good brand, and this doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand some of the negative comments made by people about this product. It works perfectly for me and the bass from the sub-woofer rocks the room. It was super easy to configure to my Samsung SUHD TV and my laptop. I would buy it again and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Saddlehick

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch. Clear, clean sound. Way above its competition.
customer_reviews.text: If you want crisp clear voice and a full musical wall with discrete instruments etc. this set is for you. The only comparisons are the higher priced Klipsch models for true fussy audiophiles.
customer_reviews.author: boby

customer_reviews.title: Rocks the whole yard.
customer_reviews.text: Used for our outdoor bbq. Sound quality is great! Woofer has plenty of kick. Only problem is the Bluetooth signal is very weak. You’ll have to keep your phone or what ever you sinking to it pretty close. Besides that, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is good. Connectivity is an issue
customer_reviews.text: For the price, sound quality is good. Connectivity is an issue, doesn't sense input 100% of the time requiring me to have to manually do it, which is annoying. Sub can drown out soundbar at times...
customer_reviews.author: SAINT808

customer_reviews.title: It definitely lives up to the Klipsch reputation! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and power! It definitely lives up to the Klipsch reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Slobob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very easy to set up. Quality equipment, quality price. Able to feel the subwoofer and it doesn't sound like someone is banging on a plastics 3 gallon bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lugg

customer_reviews.title: Lacks bass
customer_reviews.text: Lacked bass At this price point it should rock the rafters but it didn’t. My 10 yr old $150 Vizio sb kicks it’s ass.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounbar, by far better than Samsung, Sony, etc
customer_reviews.text: Deep accurate bass and clear treble. Enhances watching concerts and videos on YouTube 1000 percent!! Bought this for my winter home, have one at home already for 3 years and love it! Not as loud as a surround sound but loud enough
customer_reviews.author: dennis kloosterman

customer_reviews.title: Features are limited but if you love sound then there is no other option at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stunning for the price. Features are limited but if you love sound then there is no other option at the price point. Deep lows that resonate, clean mids and highs. Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Klipsch. 👍. I now have all 3 of the brothers. The 10, 11 and the 20. AL are awesome. True music fanatics will truly appreciate anything KLIPSCH!!
customer_reviews.author: Son's Of Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Good setup.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker set up purchased on prime day. Probably wouldn’t pay full price for them. Bluetooth connectivity has a very short range, almost need to leave device right by it. Otherwise powerful sub great sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!  Terrible remote.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this sounds. Make watching more enjoyable. The remote that comes with is not useful at all (if it works). I was able to program it to my TV remote to turn the volume up and down. Can't use some of the functions that would be available if the remote worked.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear, you’re gonna love it
customer_reviews.text: The base and sound clarity is awesome, watch your favorite action movie and be astounded
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sound bar i've heard. And i do sound for a living. Great job, Klipsche.
customer_reviews.author: Brett V.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a Klipsch sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Sounds doesn’t start until after one second and sometimes cuts out. I need to reset it every month or so. The plastic is warped and the quality of this product is NOTHING close to the monitor speakers.... big regret
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Dead just after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Sound was alright but it failed in under 2 years. Red blinking light of death. Out of warranty and not worth the cost of repair. Better off getting cheap receiver and bookshelf speakers for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Quality! clean! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... I’ve had numerous sound bars/systems... this thang is fierce sound is amazing, very very clean and the bass surrounds you and is deep and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael bishop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and operate
customer_reviews.text: It replaces a Polk. Easy to install and operate. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Think I got on a deal of ...
customer_reviews.text: Listen to this everyday. Good purchase. Think I got on a deal of the day. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba.

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound bar
customer_reviews.text: honestly the greatest soundbar I've ever heard. I think the price is even less now. the sub hits amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI connector
customer_reviews.text: On LG TVs they will not stay connected using the optical cable, recommend buying a sound bar with an HDMI connector, I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randall L Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding sound bar!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.....this setup is great sounding! I've even thought about buying a second system for our bedroom! Yes the remote is cheap, but I paired my Xfinity TV remote to the soundbar and I can now control the sound bar at any angle, at any distance!!! HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.author: HDG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great clarity and outstanding base. The 3D effect is pretty worthless though.
customer_reviews.author: 1fastdoc

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I unboxed it. Plugged it in. Paired my phone in 3 seconds. Hooked up the optical cable to the tv. Bam! Total bass ass sound in under 1 minute.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. However, the remote will drive you insane. Have to be within 4 ft of the sound bar to have any consistency with volume adjustment. Making it useless as a remote if you're having to get up every time the volume needs to be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound Quality for Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 3 weeks ago, boy do I love it. Connectivity is easy and sound quality is awesome. The $399 price was a steal. If you need a wireless/bluetooth speakers this Klipsch is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomson

customer_reviews.title: deep bass met my need overall
customer_reviews.text: the subwoofer is pretty deep and sounds powerful, bar not as much but they met my need well as a combination, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vikshopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound unbelievable bass shakes the walls only issue I ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound unbelievable bass shakes the walls only issue I have is the volume on remote takes time to respond which is minor to the superior sound it puts out whether it’s the tv or my blue tooth from my phone to listen to music
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Three stars only because the sun was defective upon arrival. Easy to set up. Returned and went with RSB-11. Hasn't arrived yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Marina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. For music, tv, and games it is a perfect stereo for a normal consumer.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is AWESOME must get. Could do better on the remote with more features.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very good deal, the sound output is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Deneen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: That sound is amazing, the Bluetooth connectivity however...not so much. The connection with my phone is intermittent at best. It does sound great hardwired to my tv though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No smart remote, etc
customer_reviews.text: No smart remote, etc. will control this sound bar. They supply the worst POS remote for it and no remote I can buy or find will even be able to control volume much less power on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waiting for my house to be built. The sound at doesn’t even cut on. I called amazon and the manufacturer and no help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound for price
customer_reviews.text: Clear sounds with great punch from the sub. the bluetooth doesn't have that good of range when streaming from a phone
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth horrible
customer_reviews.text: Awsome sound and bass but the bluetooth absolutely sucks... cant stand more then five feet away and never stays connected

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but poor Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it except the Bluetooth connection. It's static and looses connection after 4-5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for the price. Only problem is it turns on if your Directv has an update.
customer_reviews.author: Loanranger

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, amazing quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality!! I did my research on this one and compared to every other brand I'm its class this was by far the best. Really crisp sound, solid bass. I'm very pleased with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Waleed Bashir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bar
customer_reviews.text: Shakes the whole room. Have a previous version of this bar and it still going strong 3 years. Must have it blows the competition out the water. If you want to feel the sound when watching the movie go for this!
customer_reviews.author: Shah G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is the word to describe , performance of the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality.  Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my man. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Vonsetta Love

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best. My third purchase of Klipsch sound equipment and the best so far. Makes my old Sony seem like the sound came through and orange juice can and I string. I have to be careful with the bass SW, I get up early and my neighbors can feel the bass in their beds! Pure, clean sound with lots of juice when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rose

customer_reviews.title: Limited use so far... but blows my ...
customer_reviews.text: Limited use so far...but blows my previous $200 lg and samsung out of the water. So much louder and no changing volume constantly during movies because all levels are loud and clear
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can connect to the Bluetooth and you cannot turn it off
customer_reviews.text: The device can get hijacked anytime and there is no fix beyond ripping the chip out. What trash.
customer_reviews.author: David P Gutt

customer_reviews.title: but not much better in my opinion compared to the vizio sound bars
customer_reviews.text: The sound was ok, but not much better in my opinion compared to the vizio sound bars. The reason I didn't keep this soundbar is the remote didn't work at all, and also the instructions it came with were not clear. Good for someone who judges by brand not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and low end
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is excellent. The sound quality is a definite upgrade to the regular TV speakers. Great sound, including the low end. I will recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of equipment. Great sound! Only complaint is that the subwoofer(although wireless) will not work well when installed on the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Menefee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Plug so right in and works great. No need to be tech savvy.

customer_reviews.title: Good bass and crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Bass sounds great. 3-D sound isn't what I expected but the performance overall is great.

product_meta.title: Klipsch R-20B Bluetooth Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer (Satin Black)
product_meta.description: The Klipsch Reference R-20B is designed to quickly connect to most TVs. An included digital optical cable connects to your TV's digital output to the back of the soundbar. For the few TVs without an optical audio output, there is a 2-channel analog input. Once connection to your TV is made, you just plug the soundbar into a standard electrical outlet and turn it on. The built-in Dolby Digital Decoder takes over and allows the Klipsch Reference R-20B to automatically reproduce detailed, high-output sound in almost any size room no matter what format of sound is coming from the TV's output.
feature_bullets: Dolby Digital Decoder; 2.4 GHz technology: Automatically connects the soundbar and subwoofer together wirelessly.
True 2-way soundbar with a 90 x 90 Tractrix horn to deliver crisp highs seamlessly with four 3" mid-range divers for effortless sound.
Wireless 10" side-firing subwoofer with solid MDF cabinet fore deep, powerful bass
Compatible with most Bluetooth wireless technology enabled devices including mobile phones, audio devices and computers for wide-ranging use
aptX audio coding technology enables lossless, high-quality music streaming
